summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PharmaFlow pharmacy management application. Backend APIs are 100% functional (23/23 tests passed). Frontend UI and navigation work well with minor UI refresh issue in product creation.

ui_bugs.issue: Products are created successfully in backend but don't immediately appear in the products list UI
ui_bugs.details: Product creation works (backend confirms creation), but UI doesn't refresh the product list automatically. User needs to manually refresh or navigate away and back.

design_issues.issue: Missing accessibility descriptions for DialogContent components
design_issues.details: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Navigation between all pages (Products, Sales, Customers, Suppliers, Prescriptions, Reports)
Sales creation flow (cart, product search, checkout)
Product form dialog and data entry
Backend-frontend integration for sales and dashboard data
Responsive UI design with medical blue/green theme

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (9/10 major flows working, 1 UI refresh issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix product list UI refresh issue: After creating a product, the products list should automatically refresh to show the new product. The backend creation works correctly, but the frontend needs to reload the products data after successful creation.
